review: My appointment was with Dr. Ravindra Kumar Sravanam for general physician concern and I have visited the hospital. Appointment was on time and doctor was friendly with me. After the check up some medicines had suggested to take. No waiting was there in hospital and the place was neat as well hygienic. Satisfied by this doctor and I would like to recommend him for others also

The appointment for my family member and we have visited the clinic. Doctor was very nice and friendly with us, he explained all the things in detail. There was no wait time for our appointment because it was on time. Hospital staff was good and I would like to recommend this doctor
